Source file src/github.com/haraldrudell/parl/parlfs/watch-op.go

Documentation: github.com/haraldrudell/parl/parlfs 

     1  /*

     5  
     6  package parlfs
     7  
     8  import (
     9  	"strconv"
    10  
    11  	"github.com/fsnotify/fsnotify"
    12  )
    13  
    14  const WatchOpAll fsnotify.Op = 0 // Create|Write|Remove|Rename|Chmod
    15  const (
    16  	Create fsnotify.Op = 1 << iota
    17  	Write
    18  	Remove
    19  	Rename
    20  	Chmod
    21  )
    22  
    23  type Op fsnotify.Op
    24  
    25  var allBits = Create | Write | Remove | Rename | Chmod
    26  
    27  func (op Op) String() (s string) {
    28  	s = fsnotify.Op(op).String()
    29  	if unknownBits := op &^ Op(allBits); unknownBits != 0 {
    30  		s += "|x" + strconv.FormatInt(int64(unknownBits), 16)
    31  	}
    32  	return
    33  }
    34  

Build version go1.17.8.
